captions.text: Mario, Mario! Bowser has kidnapped the princess!
Not a problem, which way did they go?

Daughter you cannot go out it is past your
bed time!
I'll do what I want Daddy!
Daughter! You cannot join a religion!
Don't tell me what to do Daddy!
Wow honey, what a lovely hotel!
The Legend of Zeldas. So many Zeldas running around.
Daddy! I brought a boy home for dinner!
Bobby, do you wanna go to the prom with me?

Sarah! SARAH NO!! SARAH NOOO!! NO SARAH NO!!
NOOOOOOOOO!!!
I choose you Bobby. I choose you all.

Hey you! Speaking of Video Games we just friggin'
made one! Check it out!!

comments.author: Mc Jay Jay

comments.text:
Hi Tom! I tested KatataK!
- The gameplay is clumsy.
- You get only half your ammo worth if you don't use the basic gun.
- Said basic gun is useless past stage 2.
- The helpers are morons.
- One does not simply create something you can not avoid in a game with 
guns. Action hero 101.
- Gameplay is built for left-handed people, which is against smartphones 
standards.
- Aiming is done by tapping the target, which means that you can't both see 
and shoot your target unless you have extremely slender fingers.
- Game concept originates on cats dominating the Internet but there's not a 
single meme reference.
- You litterally empty your magazine faster than you reload it, which means 
you have at least a 50% vulnerability time ratio.
- No way to know how much cash each cat is worth.
- Every die and retry mobilegame that implies an economic system, even very 
basic, has a way to farm said funds easily. This game does not, as even 
level 1 can kill you with basic gear.
- Little to no introduction to game mechanics. Even the Megaman series on 
NES gave more hints.﻿
